text: NGC 439 is a lenticular galaxy of type SAB0^-(rs)? located in the constellation Sculptor. It was discovered on September 27, 1834 by John Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "pretty bright, small, round, gradually brighter middle." ==References== 0439 18340927 Category:Sculptor (constellation) Category:Lenticular galaxies
title: NGC 439
